TextLibrary.Text: I have given some more thought to the final foe I wish to battle.

I have given some more thought to the final foe I wish to battle.
I would like to observe you fighting one of these Arboleth. It would be good to be remembered as one who fought against the corruption and evil of Lord Bane.

Okay. We'll head out to Bonebridge and find one.
